Title: Relates to hearings for determination of claims for compensation
Summary: Relates to hearings for determination of claims for compensation; requires the court to order a hearing within forty-five days after the filing of a claim by an injured employee, and to thereafter order a hearing within forty-five days of receipt of an application by either party.
LawCode: Amd ยง20, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to hearings for determination of claims for compensation
